lyrics:
[ti:Fight of Your Life]
[ar:硬糖少女303希林娜依·高]
[al:Fight of Your Life - 特别版]
[by:zhaoxin_karakal]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Fight of Your Life (特别版) - 硬糖少女303希林娜依·高
[00:02.65]词：Unisonar
[00:02.73]曲：@Unisonar
[00:02.79]配唱：张敉尔
[00:02.95]音乐监制：
[00:03.08]朱旭光@腾讯CROS音频团队
[00:03.45]张敉尔@腾讯英雄联盟IP团队
[00:03.89]Vivita Zheng/Thomas Parisch
[00:03.96]母带工程：Joe Bozzi
[00:04.16]人声混音：佳荧文化传播有限公司
[00:04.64]出品：腾讯科技（深圳）有限公司/新鲜制造工作室/腾讯音乐娱乐科技（深圳）有限公司
[00:10.99]There is a fire in your soul
[00:17.36]A power no one knows
[00:23.35]Your fate is still untold
[00:29.30]So reach out and take control
[00:34.91]They can't divide us
[00:37.32]We won't be denied
[00:40.57]We survive
[00:47.52]This is the fight of your life
[00:50.29]Strike with all of your might
[00:53.26]Shine like a blinding light
[00:57.67]This is the fight of your life
[01:00.59]Break the chains and rise
[01:03.71]Fly till you break through the sky
[01:08.01]This is the fight of your life
[01:20.67]We won't fall no we won't turn back
[01:26.32]No one to follow we've made our path
[01:32.30]All we've lost now it's in the past
[01:38.18]We can rise as one at last
[01:43.90]They can't divide us
[01:46.70]We won't be denied
[01:49.93]We survive
[01:56.67]This is the fight of your life
[01:59.63]Strike with all of your might
[02:02.63]Shine like a blinding light
[02:06.99]This is the fight of your life
[02:09.93]Break the chains and rise
[02:12.87]Fly till you break through the sky
[02:17.33]This is the fight of your life
[02:37.23]Never gonna stop fighting
[02:39.97]You're never gonna take us down
[02:42.87]Soon we're gonna steal the throne cuz it's our time now
[02:48.85]We strike like a bolt of lightning
[02:51.65]Our strength gonna shake the ground
[02:54.60]We break through your gates and armor
[02:57.58]We ain't stoppin' till we hold the crown
[03:10.14]This is the fight of your life
[03:13.26]Strike with all of your might
[03:16.10]Shine like a blinding light
[03:20.59]This is the fight of your life
[03:23.38]Strike with all of your might
[03:26.37]Shine like a blinding light
[03:30.71]This is the fight of your life your life
